code_sample.heading: Code Sample
code_sample.code:
var payment = $.zpPayment({
    url: 'https://<<PROGRAM SUB-DOMAIN>>.<<PROGRAM DOMAIN>>/online/v5',
    merchantCode: '<<MERCHANT-CODE>>',
    apiKey: '<<API-KEY>>',
    fingerprint: '<<FINGERPRINT>>',
    redirectUrl: '<<Your Redirect URL>>',
    mode: 0,
    displayMode: 0,
    customerName: 'Customer Name',
    customerReference: 'Reference 1',
    paymentAmount: 100.00,
    timeStamp: '<<TIMESTAMP>>'
});
var result = payment.init();
notes: Include the following in your code
The implementation depends on jQuery version 3.4.1 and requires jQuery to be included in your code.

Execute the following jQuery code on the click of your ”Pay Now” button. PROGRAM DOMAIN , PROGRAM SUB-DOMAIN , and API-KEY will be provided by Zenith Payments. ( Note that these will be different for each environment i.e. Live and UAT ) For FINGERPRINT refer to the parameter details below.

rows.Remarks: Plugin access url. We strongly recommend v5 integration.
As provided by Zenith.
As provided by Zenith

The Fingerprint is a SHA3-512 (v5), SHA512 (v4) or SHA1 hash (v3) of the fields in the following order with a pipe (|) as a separator.
Credentials provided by Zenith Payments are case sensitive.
apiKey|userName|password|mode|paymentAmount|merchantUniquePaymentId|timestamp
apiKey: refer apiKey parameter
userName: provided by Zenith Payments
password: provided by Zenith Payments
mode: refer mode parameter
paymentAmount: provide payment amount in cents without symbol. e.g. for $150.53 pass 15053. Pass 0 when mode is 2.
merchantUniquePaymentId: refer merchantUniquePaymentId parameter
timestamp: provide current datetime in UTC ISO 8601 format as timestamp. format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss
SHA3-512 (applicable for v5) - To generate fingerprint for this page you can use
online SHA3-512 generator>.
SHA512 (applicable for v4) - To generate fingerprint for this page you can use
online SHA512 generator.
SHA1 (applicable for v3) - To generate fingerprint for this page you can use
online SHA1 generator.
For methods of generating a SHA1 hash (applicable for v3) in your language refer
this web site.
The page will redirect to this URL with the result in the query string. Refer the return parameters section below.
If this is set to true, all validation and processing errors are returned part of the redirect url. Default is 'false'.

Must be one of the following three values
0 - Make Payment
1 - Tokenise
2 - Custom Payment
3 - Preauthorization
Defaults to 0 if not provided.

Must be one of the following two values
0 - Default (Modal)
1 - Redirect Url
Defaults to 0 if not provided.
Google Pay and Apple Pay works if Modal or Redirect Url with iframe is used.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Custom label to override default customer name display text
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Custom label to override default customer reference display text

Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Returns applicable fee if provided with mode 1.
Custom label to override default payment amount display text

Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show bank account option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show PayTo bank account option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show PayID option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Apple Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Google Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Latitude Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Slice Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show UnionPay option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show AliPay+ option only if the option is enable for the merchant. Default is false.

Required if mode is set to 1.
Show the applicable fees for the token at the end of the process. Default is false.

Optional if mode is set to 1.
Show the applicable failed payment fees for the token at the end of the process. Default is false.
Payment id provided by the merchant. Must be unique and can not be reused if a transaction is processed using this id.
timestamp is required for v4 and optional for v3. Provide current datetime in UTC ISO 8601 format as timestamp. format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss
Use this parameter to make a payment using a card proxy which is generated using mode '1'.
The URL will be called with HTTP POST method to submit the result. Refer the return parameters section below.

This will hide the Terms and Conditions.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

This will send confirmation email to merchant.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.
Additional reference to identify customer. This will be passed on to the merchant reconciliation file (PDF & CSV)
Contact number

Email address to which invoice will be emailed if the merchant is configured.
It is mandatory in V4.
Australian Business Number. Used for reward programs if the Program is enabled to provide reward points.
Customer company name.

Plugin Title.
Defaults to 'Process Payment' if not provided.

This will hide the program header including program logo.
Defaults to 'true' if not provided.

This will hide the merchant logo if any.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

Must be one of the following three values
0 - Default (based on pricing profile)
1 - Merchant (Merchant will pay the fee regardless of pricing profile setting)
2 - Customer (Customer will pay the fee regardless of pricing profile setting)
Defaults to 0 if not provided.
departureDate is required for Slice Pay. Provide date in UTC ISO 8601 format as departureDate. format: yyyy-MM-dd

Must be one of the following two values
0 - Customer Facing - default (cardholder must enter CCV or 3DS)
1 - Merchant Facing (for merchant use only - no CCV or 3DS) - if supported by merchant options.
For Mode 0 and 2 height defaults to 725px, for mode 1 height defaults to 450px if not provided.
Javascript callback function to execute when plug-in is closed.

This will send confirmation email to customer.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

This will allow to save the card information.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.
This option will only work if 'Enable Plugin Pay & Save Card' option is enabled at program or merchant level.
Stock Keeping Unit – Optional text fields, allowing up to 50 alphanumeric characters. If the value exceeds 50 characters, only the first 50 characters will be retained and the rest discarded.
Stock Keeping Unit – Optional text fields, allowing up to 50 alphanumeric characters. If the value exceeds 50 characters, only the first 50 characters will be retained and the rest discarded.

tables.label: The following parameters are returned in mode 0 and 2. Same payload is also delivered in JSON format if callback URL is provided.

rows.Value:
Possible values (case insensitive):
success => Processing successful
failed => Processing failed
error => All validation errors and generic errors. This means, the plugin did not processed the request
Same as input parameter.
Same as input parameter.
Same as input parameter.
Account or card number used to process payment.
Payment reference. (applicable for Payment)
Preauthorization reference. (applicable for Preauthorization)
Processor reference.

Possiible values
0 => (Pending)
1 => (Error)
3 => (Successful)
4 => (Failed)
5 => (Cancelled)
6 => (Suppressed)
7 => (InProgress)

The date and time when the payment is processed.
format:
yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss

The date when the payment is settled to the merchant.
format:
yyyy-MM-dd
Flag to indicate whetehr the funds are settled to the merchant or not.
Same as payment amount.
Fee charged to the the customer to process the payment.
Base amount + Customer fee. (applicable for Payment)
Base amount + Customer fee. (applicable for Preauthorization)
Base amount - Merchant fee, if applicable.
Merchant code.
Populated only when payment is not successful.
Populated only when payment is not successful.
Returned only if payment is processed using cardProxy input parameter. The value will be same as cardProxy.
Returned only if payment is processed using PayID.
Returned only if payment is processed using PayID. Display name for the PayID

tables.label: The following parameters are returned in mode 1. Same payload is also delivered in JSON format if callback URL is provided.

rows.Value: The proxy that can be saved and then use to process payment using API or payment plugin.
Type of card i.e. Visa, MasterCards, Ammercican Express Or Bank Account.
Card holder name provided by the user. Returned only if user selects credit / debit card.
Obfuscated card number provided by the user. Returned only if user selects credit / debit card.

Card expiry date. Returned only if user selects credit / debit card.
format:
MM/CCYY
Account name provided by the user. Returned only if user selects bank account.
Obfuscated account number provided by the user. Returned only if user selects bank account.
Returned only if payment is processed using PayID.
Returned only if payment is processed using PayID. Display name for the PayID
Flag to indicate whetehr the card is restricted or not.
Same as input parameter.
Customer fee applicable to process a payment of amount specified in PaymentAmount input parameter.
Merchant fee applicable to process a payment of amount specified in PaymentAmount input parameter.
The total amount that will be processed i.e. PaymentAmount + CustomerFee.

rows.Description: Make sure fingerprint and apikey are passed.

The fingerprint should be unique everytime.
This can be achieved by using new MerchantUniquePaymentId and current Timestamp everytime the plugin is opened.
Invalid Credentials. Applicable for V1 and V2(V1 and V2 are deprecated).
Make sure fingerprint and apikey are passed.
Account is not active. Contact administrator.
Invalid Credentials. Make sure fingerprint is correctly generated, refer to fingerprint generation logic.
Security violation. Close and open the plugin with fresh fingerprint.
Security violation. Close and open the plugin with fresh fingerprint.
Timestamp cannot be empty. Make sure to pass same timestamp as in generated fingerprint.
MerchantCode provided does not match with the provided credentials.
Security violation. Close and open the plugin with fresh fingerprint.
CustomerEmail can not be empty(V4 onwards).
DepartureDate is required for Slice Pay.
Invalid Timestamp. Timestamp needs to be in UTC ISO 8601 format.
